mapper.sql: id, clazz, first_h, first_m, first_s, cycle_h, cycle_m, cycle_s
mapper.insert: insert into timer_task_model (id, clazz, first_h, first_m, first_s, cycle_h, cycle_m, cycle_s) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{clazz,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{firstH,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{firstM,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{firstS,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{cycleH,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{cycleM,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{cycleS,jdbcType=INTEGER})

update timer_task_model
clazz = #{clazz,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
first_h = #{firstH,jdbcType=INTEGER},
first_m = #{firstM,jdbcType=INTEGER},
first_s = #{firstS,jdbcType=INTEGER},
cycle_h = #{cycleH,jdbcType=INTEGER},
cycle_m = #{cycleM,jdbcType=INTEGER},
cycle_s = #{cycleS,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update timer_task_model set clazz = #{clazz,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, first_h = #{firstH,jdbcType=INTEGER}, first_m = #{firstM,jdbcType=INTEGER}, first_s = #{firstS,jdbcType=INTEGER}, cycle_h = #{cycleH,jdbcType=INTEGER}, cycle_m = #{cycleM,jdbcType=INTEGER}, cycle_s = #{cycleS,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select
from timer_task_model where clazz is not null and clazz != ''
